properties.name: Elmont, NY 11/9/05 Abduction-Rape of 15 yo girl
properties.description: Posted by Researcherelmont, ny"Nassau police called Littlejohn a person of interest in the Elmont case because of similarities between it and key elements in the St. Guillen case. They have not named Littlejohn as a suspect...the assailant forced the girl at gunpoint into a van on Hill Avenue near Hempstead Turnpike at about 5 p.m. that November day. The girl later told authorities that, once in the van, he covered her face with a coat or blanket and secured it with packaging tape and drove away. After raping the girl, the man dumped her on a street corner about a mile and a half away, at Baylis Avenue and First Street in Elmont, police said. The girl told police that her assailant wore what appeared to be some type of uniform." [urlhttp://www.newsday.com/news/local/longisland/ny-lirape174665364mar17,0,1223412.story?coll=ny-linews-headlines[/url]

properties.name: Hip Hop Chow
properties.description: Posted by Researcher129 Second Avenue, ny, nyEric Kwan is the DJ of dim sum and the spin master of soul food. An emcee behind the stove, this 26-year-old chef samples Chinese and American flavors at his East Village restaurant Hip Hop Chow. “I love hip hop and I love cooking, and I\'m Chinese-American and I wanted to represent who I am,” says Kwan. “I wanted to have half the menu as Chinese flavor combinations and the other half as American, so I call this soul food with a twist.”
